title: Analysed data
text:
This component refers to spatially distributed gridded data that have been derived from observational data as the result of an analytical process.

Some examples are:
1. Singular variables such as:
    1. Normals
    2. Observations for a given day or time
    3. Averages
    4. Percentiles
    5. Cumulative data
    6. Extremes
    7. Homogenized data
2. Multivariables such as:
    1. The generation of anomalies (difference between the normals data and a specific monthly variable)
    2. More complex data such as potential evapotranspiration
